import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ScreService } from '../scre.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-list-view-screen', templateUrl: './list-view-screen.component.html', styleUrls: ['./list-view-screen.component.css'], }) /** * @author Thejesh * @Description admin can manage screens from the dashboard. */ export class ListViewScreenComponent implements OnInit { screens: any[]; constructor(private scService: ScreService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.scService.getAllScreens().subscribe((data: any[]) => { this.screens = data; }); } }
